alert.note: Alert for Lower Bucks; Upper Bucks (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:13PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hunterdon, southwestern Somerset and central Bucks Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 613 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lumberville, or 19 miles northwest of Trenton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Byram, Bedminster, Flemington, Tinicum, High Bridge, Clinton, New Hope, Frenchtown, Lebanon, Stockton, Millstone, Flagtown, Sergeantsville, Pipersville, Cloverhill, Erwinna, Annandale, Gardenville, White House Station and Lumberville. This includes Interstate 78 in New Jersey between mile markers 17 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for central, northern and northwestern New Jersey...and southeastern Pennsylvania.
